member.name: M:FinancialInstructionNet.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:FinancialInstructionNet.Controllers.Classes.SettlementDateCalculator
member.summary: Works out what the settlement date is A Work week starts Monday and ends friday, unless the currency of the trade is AED or SAR, where the work week starts Sunday and ends thursday. No other holidays to be taken into account. A trade can only be settled on a working day if and instructed date falls on a weekend, then the settlement date should be changed to the next working day

member.name: F:FinancialInstructionNet.Controllers.Classes.SettlementDateCalculator._sundayWorkingDayCurrencies
member.summary: All the currencies which working days start on a sunday

member.summary: Initiates the calculator and ensures all the currencies are in upper case to make sure the currency check is case insenstive

member.summary: Works out the settlemnt date based on the rules set above
